HomePage.title: Weaving Light into Logic.
HomePage.subtitle: Atelier Shahrazad is an avant-garde digital laboratory. We craft bespoke, immersive web artifacts for brands that refuse to blend in.

Manifesto.headline: A Thousand and One Digital Realities.
Manifesto.storyP1: Legend has it that Shahrazad wove a thousand and one tales to cheat death and rewrite a king’s destiny.
Manifesto.storyP2: At Atelier Shahrazad, we believe brands face their own mortality in the noise of the digital age. Survival requires more than just logic; it requires a masterpiece. We are the modern storytellers. But instead of words, we weave our narratives using light, motion, and code.
Manifesto.storyP3: We do not build websites. We engineer immersive digital artifacts—spatial experiences that pull the user down a golden thread of interaction. For those who refuse to be forgotten, we craft the unforgettable.

Works.title: The Artifacts
Works.subtitle: Where logic ends, our storytelling begins.

01.title: Maison Obsidian
01.description: A digital architecture masterpiece for a high-end fashion label. We discarded the traditional grid, replacing it with a fluid, WebGL-driven spatial experience where garments breathe and react to the user's presence.

02.title: Aethel Real Estate
02.description: Selling not just spaces, but atmospheres. We translated the physical weight of concrete and the lightness of glass into a digital scroll, using volumetric lighting and cinematic camera choreography.

03.title: The Lumina Artifact
03.description: An exploration of light and logic. This conceptual piece bends typography and geometry through glass refraction portals, proving that a website can be a living, breathing art installation.

Deliverables.title: What We Deliver
Deliverables.subtitle: Digital craftsmanship defined by three core pillars.

01.title: Immersive Web Worlds
01.description: Crafting spatial, three-dimensional environments that transcend traditional browsing, turning every visit into an unforgettable architectural journey.

02.title: Bespoke Digital Art Direction
02.description: Curating a distinct visual vocabulary. We orchestrate typography, color theory, and layout to whisper true luxury.

03.title: Creative Engineering & WebGL
03.description: Pushing the boundaries of the browser. We leverage mathematical precision and custom shaders to build fluid, cinematic experiences.

Process.title: The Alchemy
Process.subtitle: From abstract thought to pixel-perfect reality.

01.title: Extraction
01.desc: We don't read briefs; we extract the DNA of your brand. Discovering the hidden narrative that dictates the visual language.

02.title: Distillation
02.desc: Stripping away the noise. We refine user interfaces into their purest, most elegant forms. True luxury breathes in empty space.

03.title: Incantation
03.desc: Where logic meets magic. Weaving custom WebGL shaders and complex mathematics to breathe kinetic life into static designs.

04.title: Manifestation
04.desc: The artifact is born. A seamless, high-performance digital world ready to captivate and convert.
